column5: I hit Youtube every so often and get to see things. Some are a little thought provoking. This one is particularly good because I see youngsters capable of both critical and abstract thinking. Some really bright people. Here's an example of a concept that one group is developing. This is not costing millions of dollars either. Enjoy.  Sorry if you've already seen this.  <iframe width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/D4azRuqn-IU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
I can only think of one thing and its frightening
I haven't watched this yet but I love TED talks.  The semi recent one with Salman Khan's new ideas on education was really good.  I will check this one out when I get home.
Thanks Roy I have just found a new favorite site after OFC of course
Absolutely nothing scary about any of that. You remind me of a dude from the 1600's who learns about the "powers" of a box that captures you and anything else it sees...the evil camera.
Roy thanks that was neat and I found a new site to go to also!!
It won't be long before the phrase "Beam me up Scotty" actually means something!
Certainly interesting. Not for me though. She ends it with the words "Brain Implant" and those two words just dont mesh well with me lol.
Amazing technology to say the least.... that thing would be awesome if it had flasher capabilities
Thanks brudder. Guess you being  older then me,I have another way to unwind.  TFS
incredible. absolutley amazing. That is going to be one wealthy young man. Bill Gates, get ready - that is if you haven't already hired him
